name: Victims of Ice
description:
The world has been struck by a never ending winter. Cities are overflown with people and you're one of many who didn't make it to the city in time. You're freezing in front of the city gates and hoping you'll find a way to enter the city. 

 

 

This is a short survival game consisting of fun combats, upgrading your weapons, killing chickens, wolves and bears and finally, a boss fight! Hope you have fun!

 

 

 

(=^-^=)/  Thank you for downloading! We appretiate any feedback.   \(=^-^=)
